hep.graphics.heprep.streamer
Class XMLHepRepStreamerFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--hep.graphics.heprep.HepRepFactory
        |
        +--hep.graphics.heprep.streamer.XMLHepRepStreamerFactory
public class XMLHepRepStreamerFactory
extends HepRepFactory

Factory for HepReps which streams HepReps directly as they are created to a stream, without keeping them in memory.

Strict order of creation applies:

  1. HepRepFactory factory = XMLHepRepStreamerFactory.create();
  2. OutputStream out = new OutputStream("file.heprep");
  3. HepRepWriter writer = factory.createHepRepWriter(out);
  4. HepRep heprep = factory.createHepRep();
  5. heprep.addLayer(...); ...
  6. HepRepTreeID typeTreeID = factory.createTreeID(...);
  7. HepRepTypeTree typeTree = factory.createTypeTree(...);
  8. [heprep.addTypeTree(typeTree)];
  9. HepRepType type = factory.createHepRepType(...); ...
  10. ...
  11. HepRepInstanceTree instanceTree = factory.createHepRepInstanceTree(...);
  12. [heprep.addInstanceTree(instanceTree)];
  13. HepRepInstance instance = factory.createHepRepInstance(...); ...
  14. ...
  15. writer.close();

Version:
$Id: XMLHepRepStreamerFactory.java,v 1.4 2002/11/12 00:14:51 duns Exp $
Author:
Mark Donszelmann

public static HepRepFactory create()
Description copied from class: HepRepFactory
Creates a heprep factory based on the content of heprep.properties file. If not found the default HepRepFactory is created.
